dmca.title: **** SPAM **** copyrighted material on your server - DCMA Notice
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: webmaster@spunkycash.com [mailto:webmaster@spunkycash.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 13, 2005 8:36 AM
To: yndphong@gmail.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: legal@spunkypro.com
Subject: **** SPAM **** copyrighted material on your server - DCMA Notice

Dear Sirs/Mesdames:

RE:    Infringement and request for removal pursuant to 17 USC 512

YOU ARE HEREBY NOTIFIED of infringement pursuant to the Digital Millennium
Copyright Act 17 USC 512.  Pursuant thereto you are hereby given notice that
the undersigned has authority to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive
right, that is, copyrights of Spunky Productions Inc. operating under its
trade name diddylicious.com, diddyandserena.com.  The information set forth
herein is believed to be accurate pursuant to a good faith belief that the
use of the material in the matter complained of is not authorized by my
client, its agent or under the applicable law.

The infringement material is identified as being located on the World Wide
Web at:

http://www.yndforum.com/showthread.php?t=9787

Pursuant to the DCMA you are required to expeditiously remove, or disable
access to, the infringing material, and notify the subscriber of such
removal or disablement.  Pursuant to 17 USC 512(g)(1) an internet service
provider (ISP) that has registered with the copyright office the name and
contact information of the person to receive infringement notices, enjoys
immunity from liability for the removal or disablement of infringing
content, so long as additional safe guards as provided by statute.  Please
forward this notice to your corporate legal department, general counsel, or
other legal counsel immediately for action and direct all responses to the
attention of the writer at the contact information provided below.

I thank you for your immediate attention to this notice and request for
removal of the infringing material forthwith.

Yours truly,

Matt Stregger
Spunky Productions Inc.
